sentences.en: 8 is divisible by 2 and 4, but not by 3.
A project's objectives are usually very clear cut and often divisible into discrete component parts.
sentences.cn: 项目的目标通常十分明确,并且可以分解成若干个子项目.

sentences.en: Aim the construction method of exponentially perfect numbers not divisible by 3 is searched.
sentences.cn: 目的寻找构造不能被3整除的指数完全数的方法.

sentences.en: An election year is one in which all four members are evenly divisible by four.
sentences.cn: 选举年是年份的四位数字能被4整除的年.

sentences.en: Even numbers are divisible by two.
He argued that all matter was infinitely divisible.
sentences.cn: 他坚持所有物质都可无限地分.

sentences.en: How many three - digit positive integers have their sum of digits divisible by 3?
sentences.cn: 有多少个三位正整数的数字之和可被3整除?

sentences.en: Since our example deals with whole, discrete units rather than with petrfectly divisible units.
sentences.cn: 因为本例中我们涉及的是整体而分立的单位,并不是完全分割的单位.

sentences.en: The ideal money is something universally acceptable, easily stored and transported, and highly divisible.
sentences.cn: 理想的货币是被普遍接受的一般等价物,便于储藏和携带, 而且易于分割.

sentences.en: The integer 1 is divisible only by itself; it is not a prime.
sentences.cn: 整数1只能被它本身整除, 所以不是素数.

sentences.en: Thirteen is not divisible by any even number.
This Guarantee is divisible, transferable and assignable without presentation of it to us.
sentences.cn: 这项担保可以分割 、 让与和过户,而无须向我们陈述.

sentences.en: To study special Markov processes with infinitely divisible limit distributions, the characteristic function was used.
sentences.cn: 研究极限分布具有无穷可分性的马氏过程.

words.tran_cn: 分裂的；分开的；有分歧的
分裂的；区分的；造成不和的
[数] 除法；部门；分割；师（军队）；赛区
划分；除；分开；使产生分歧

trans.tran_en: able to be divided, for example by a number
